name: Eveleen
description:
Eveleen

This is a prototype for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it Alive.

You play as eveleen, a young women who's depressed.  Her life isn't going how she'd like and she's ready to make a change.  Through a series of decisions you must try to make a better life for yourself.

This is very early stages and may never see anymore development.  It ends at Day 13 and bugs out.

In keeping with the theme, the aim is to keep "the hope" alive.  To keep Eveleen's "happiness" alive.

I'm super disappointed I couldn't get it to run in WebGL.  I don't like requiring people to download a zip file in order to experience a prototype.  I say thank you to anyone who choose to do so.
